content.rendered:
Directed by Sunhil Sippy.

Written by Althea Kaushal. Shikhaa Sharma. Sunhil Sippy. Ishita Moitra.

Cast Sunny Leone(Sunny Leone). Sonakshi Sinha(Noor). Rudhraksh Jaiswal(Little Zara (as Rudraksh Jaiswal)). Chloé Booyens(Waitress). Purab Kohli(Ayan Banerjee). Vaibhav Raj Gupta(Traffic Signal boy 1). Avantika Akerkar(News Presenter). Shibani Dandekar(Zara). Manish Chaudhari(Shekhar (as Manish Chaudhary)). Suchitra Pillai(Lavina). Kanan Gill(Saad). M.K. Raina(Noor’s father (as Maharaj Krishna Raina)). Smita Tambe(Malti). Nikhil Khurana(Rahul Parekh). Renaye Tejani(Saad’s Father). Sippora Zoutewelle(Zarina). Gareth Lawrence(Chef Raphael). Shahnaaz Deshpande(Neyantara). Andrew Goddard(Sous Chef). Aishwarrya Khanna(Divya (as Ajita Khanna)). Gaurav Bakshi(Little Saad – UK). Hempushpak Arora(Dr. Shinde). Randhir Kumar Kashap(Handstand Man). Jehangir Lawyer(Jeroo). Nikhil Khurana(Rahul Parekh). Manjushri Bhuyan(Little Noor). Kavita Hurry(Amrita). Nasir Hussian Shaikh(Noor’s Camera Man). Guy Stewart(Bartender). Yulian Caesar(Waiter (as Yulian Shchukin)). Hira Mehta(Lady in Art Gallery). Michael Booth(Waiter 1). Suraj Kumar Roy(Vilas). Babita Gupta(Dr. shinde’s Receptionist). Helmet Lady(Lisa Sadanah). Mui George(Waiter 2). Gareth Lawerence(Head Chef). Yuvraj Basra(Little Saad – India). Mahrukh Nari Makuujina(Firdausi). Dheeraj Kumar(Traffic Signal boy 2). Bhau Matale(Bodyguard)

Language Hindi.

Producers Vinay Chaukar. Hanif Chunawala. Priya Gupta. Sumalata Kollabathini. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Vikram Malhotra. Sanjay Mehta. Rupal Patel. Sandip Patel. Mehjabeen Raja. Shikhaa Sharma.

Production Abundantia Entertainment. T-Series.
